FuncDef: This command specifies a percentage based threshold which represent the minimal available percentage of the prefix with configured length in the pool. The system will send out a warning if the actual percentage is lower than the configured percentage.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the percentage of used prefixes with the minimum free threshold length in the pool compared to the number of provisioned prefixes. Values-0 to 100.
Specifies the number of used prefixes with the minimum free threshold length in the pool compared to the number of provisioned prefixes. Values-0 to 4294967295.
